Title: Eight killed in suspected militia attack on Taraba-Benue border
Summary: At least eight persons were reportedly killed following an attack by suspected armed Fulani militias on farmers in Chinku community, Wukari Local Government Area, near the Taraba–Benue border . Zagazola Makama, a counter-insurgency media expert, gathered that the assailants, armed with .

Title: Caleb varsity students win hackathon, develop new agric software
Summary: Caleb University students from the Computer Science, Cyber Security, and Software Engineering department emerged as the winner of the Bell’s University Hackathon Competition with a newly developed world-class software named Valor .

Title: Support Nigeria’s development with quality research, Ex-minister tells varsities
Summary: Former Minister of Finance, Mansur Muhtar, urges tertiary institutions to commit to quality education and research . Muhtar harped on the need for inclusive partnerships among government, industry, and industry .

Title: Nigeria’s roads in shambles despite N1.1tr foreign Sukuk debt
Summary: Nigeria would be returning to the bond market to raise a fresh N300 billion through its upcoming Series VII Sukuk . The Sharia-compliant financial instrument is aimed at attracting ethical investors . Between 2017 and December 2023, the government raised over N1.1tr foreign Sukuk debt .

Title: Lawan denies role in critic’s arrest, slams online paper for false report
Summary: Office of Senator Ahmad Lawan strongly denies allegations linking the former Senate President to the arrest of his constituent . Ishe’u Ibrahim Jadda was arrested over criticism of the Gashua Water Supply Project . Lawan described the claims as “false, reckless, and malicious”

Title: El Clasico: Barcelona beat Real Madrid in thriller to move to brink of Liga title
Summary: Barcelona mounted a spectacular comeback to beat Real Madrid 4-3 in El Clasico . Barcelona move to the brink of the La Liga title with victory .

Title: Nigerian Army Arrests 12 Terrorists in Kwara
Summary: The Nigerian Army said it has arrested at least twelve persons in connection with acts of terrorism carried out by a breakaway group of the Boko-Haram insurgents known as "Mahmuda" The group reportedly occupied the Kanji Lake National Park in Northern parts of Kwara state .

Title: West Ham bury Man United 2-0 as Amorim continues poor domestic form
Summary: Manchester United slumped to a 2-0 home defeat at home to West Ham . United's woeful league campaign hit a new low as they continue their poor domestic form .

Title: 5 proposed changes to UK immigration rules you should know
Summary: UK Home Secretary, Yvette Cooper, unveils bold overhaul of the country's immigration system . The overhaul is aimed at rebalancing the labour market, reducing reliance on foreign workers, and restoring public confidence .

Title: Protests, rejections trail APC LG primaries over alleged imposition of candidates
Summary: The Lagos State All Progressives Congress (APC) primaries were held in Lagos . The party's primaries have been concluded ahead of the June 12 elections .

Title: Air Peace jet hits antelope on Abuja runway, NCAA clarifies delays
Summary: An Air Peace aircraft was grounded at the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport, Abuja, after it collided with a large antelope while taxiing on the runway . The impact decimated the animal and rendered the aircraft on the ground, causing flight disruptions .

Title: Alake harps on global collaboration for sustainable energy transition
Summary: Minister of Solid Minerals Development, Dele Alake has renewed his call for global cooperation . He urged world leaders and key industry players to strengthen partnerships in advancing a sustainable energy transition . Alake emphasised the importance of global partnerships in building a resilient and sustainable mining sector .

Title: Sanwo-Olu extols Pa Fasoranti's contributions to Yorubaland, Nigeria at 99
Summary: Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, has joined the league of dignitaries that have congratulated the Leader of the pan-Yoruba socio-cultural organisation, Afenifere, Pa Reuben Fasoranti, on his 99th birthday celebration today . The Lagos Governor, in a statement

Title: Oluremi Tinubu unveils 100-bed hospital in Imo
Summary: First Lady of Nigeria, Senator Oluremi Tinubu inaugurated a 100-bed Mother and Child Centre at Awo-Omamma General Hospital near Owerri, Imo . The state-of-the-art facility was constructed by the Office of the Senior Special Assistant to the President on Sustainable Development Goals .

Title: Cross River APC endorses Tinubu, Otu for 2027 elections
Summary: The All Progressives Congress in Cross River has endorsed President Bola Tinubu and Governor Bassey Otu for a second term in office . This was the outcome of an APC stakeholders’ meeting convened by the Central Progressives Initiative, in collaboration with the party’s central leadership .
